it.polito.nffg.neo4j.exceptions

Class MyGenericExceptionMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polito.nffg.neo4j.exceptions.MyGenericExceptionMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper<MyGenericException>

    public class MyGenericExceptionMapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper<MyGenericException>
    This class is used to map a 'captured' MyGenericException to an instance of class Response. Within the response is contained an object of the JAXB annotated class HttpMessage.
    See Also:
    MyGenericException, ExceptionMapper

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MyGenericExceptionMapper() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response toResponse(MyGenericException mge)
      This method is automatically 'launched' when an instance of MyGenericException is 'captured' and return the generated object of the Response class.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • toResponse

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response toResponse(MyGenericException mge)
        This method is automatically 'launched' when an instance of MyGenericException is 'captured' and return the generated object of the Response class.
        Specified by:
        toResponse in interface javax.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper<MyGenericException>
        Parameters:
        mge - the instance of MyGenericException class.
        Returns:
        an object of the Response class that contains an object of HttpMessage class.
